WizardLevel5Spells.Name: Animate Objects
WizardLevel5Spells.Description: Objects come to life at your command.

WizardLevel5Spells.Name: Arcane Hand
WizardLevel5Spells.Description: You create a Large hand of shimmering, translucent force in an unoccupied space that you can see within range.

WizardLevel5Spells.Name: Cloudkill
WizardLevel5Spells.Description: You create a 20-foot-radius sphere of poisonous, yellow-green fog centered on a point you choose within range.

WizardLevel5Spells.Name: Cone of Cold
WizardLevel5Spells.Description: A blast of cold air erupts from your hands.

WizardLevel5Spells.Name: Conjure Elemental
WizardLevel5Spells.Description: You call forth an elemental servant.

WizardLevel5Spells.Name: Contact Other Plane
WizardLevel5Spells.Description: You mentally contact a demigod, the spirit of a long-dead sage, or some other mysterious entity from another plane.

WizardLevel5Spells.Name: Creation
WizardLevel5Spells.Description: You pull wisps of shadow material from the Shadowfell to create a nonliving object of vegetable matter within range.

WizardLevel5Spells.Name: Dominate Person
WizardLevel5Spells.Description: You attempt to beguile a humanoid that you can see within range.

WizardLevel5Spells.Name: Dream
WizardLevel5Spells.Description: This spell shapes a creature's dreams.

WizardLevel5Spells.Name: Geas
WizardLevel5Spells.Description: You place a magical command on a creature that you can see within range.

WizardLevel5Spells.Name: Hold Monster
WizardLevel5Spells.Description: Choose a creature that you can see within range.

WizardLevel5Spells.Name: Legend Lore
WizardLevel5Spells.Description: Name or describe a person, place, or object.

WizardLevel5Spells.Name: Mislead
WizardLevel5Spells.Description: You become invisible at the same time that an illusory double of you appears where you are standing.

WizardLevel5Spells.Name: Modify Memory
WizardLevel5Spells.Description: You attempt to reshape another creature's memories.

WizardLevel5Spells.Name: Passwall
WizardLevel5Spells.Description: A passage appears at a point of your choice that you can see on a wooden, plaster, or stone surface.

WizardLevel5Spells.Name: Planar Binding
WizardLevel5Spells.Description: With this spell, you attempt to bind a celestial, an elemental, a fey, or a fiend to your service.

WizardLevel5Spells.Name: Scrying
WizardLevel5Spells.Description: You can see and hear a particular creature you choose that is on the same plane of existence as you.

WizardLevel5Spells.Name: Seeming
WizardLevel5Spells.Description: This spell allows you to change the appearance of any number of creatures that you can see within range.

WizardLevel5Spells.Name: Telekinesis
WizardLevel5Spells.Description: You gain the ability to move or manipulate creatures or objects by thought.

WizardLevel5Spells.Name: Telepathic Bond
WizardLevel5Spells.Description: You forge a telepathic link among up to eight willing creatures of your choice within range.

WizardLevel5Spells.Name: Teleportation Circle
WizardLevel5Spells.Description: As you cast the spell, you draw a 10-foot-diameter circle on the ground inscribed with sigils that link your location to a permanent teleportation circle of your choice whose sigil sequence you know and that is on the same plane of existence as you.

WizardLevel5Spells.Name: Wall of Force
WizardLevel5Spells.Description: An invisible wall of force springs into existence at a point you choose within range.

WizardLevel5Spells.Name: Wall of Stone
WizardLevel5Spells.Description: A nonmagical wall of solid stone springs into existence at a point you choose within range.
